alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, and east central Southampton Counties, the City of Norfolk, the northwestern City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth, the southeastern City of Suffolk, the northwestern City of Virginia Beach, the City of Hampton and the southern City of Newport News through 845 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grand View to Crittenden to near Sedley. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is possible. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hampton, Langley AFB, Hampton University, Grand View, Crittenden, Buckroe Beach, Fort Monroe and Driver around 735 PM EDT. Churchland and Western Branch around 750 PM EDT. Chesapeake and Portsmouth around 755 PM EDT. Old Dominion University and Norfolk NAS around 805 PM EDT. Downtown Norfolk, Downtown Portsmouth, Ocean View, Ghent and Cradock around 810 PM EDT. Norfolk State University and Norview around 815 PM EDT. Norfolk, Norfolk International and Kings Fork around 825 PM EDT. Virginia Wesleyan University and Regent University around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, South Norfolk, Carrollton, Portlock, Longview, Benns Church, Princess Anne Plaza, Suffolk Airport, Huntersville and Hilton Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk; Virginia Beach
